root.name: Batman: Gotham City Racer
root.description: OverviewBatman: Gotham City Racer is a 3D racing game developed by Sinister and published by Ubisoft for the PlayStation on April 19, 2001. The second Batman game to be based on the animated TV series The New Batman Adventures, players take to the Gotham City streets in the Batmobile.
